BIO

Hello! I'm Austin Scriver and I am a junior full stack web developer certified through the University of Arizona. My passion for coding came after having to learn Python for data analysis in a chemistry class and thinking, "Wow, I'd much rather be doing this". A few weeks later, I recieved an advertisment for a coding bootcamp offered through the University of Arizona. After applying, I was told that undergraduates who are already enrolled in courses could not attend the bootcamp. Well, they didn't have to tell me twice.

Aside from web development, I also am an avid gamer and car enthusiast.
